entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bracebridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:59 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 6:50 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 1.4°C
Wind: E 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to a few flurries after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
